Header.paragraph: Centre of Excellence in DNS Security (CoE-DNS) is established by C-DAC (Center for Development of Advanced Computing), Bangalore.

About.paragraph: Centre of Excellence in DNS Security (CoE-DNS) is established by C-DAC (Center for Development of Advanced Computing), Bangalore, under the aegis of the Internet Governance Division of Ministry of Electronics & Information Technology (MeitY), Government of India and sponsored by the National Internet Exchange of India (NIXI).

Training.text: DNS Security (Seminar) on 30th March 2024 in association with ISOC, Hyderabad
DNS Security, Threat and Mitigation (Webinar) on 13th February 2024 in association with IRINN
DNS Security and its Concepts (Hybrid) on 31st October 2023
Internet Security for All (Webinar) on 21st October 2022
DNS Ecosystem and Security Webinar for NFSU, Delhi on 04th May 2022
A Safe Healthy DNS Ecosystem Webinar IIGF on 23rd December 2021
The Roles & Types of DNS Abuse in Cyber Security Webinar organized by NIXI on 1st Novmber 2021
